login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access the Oil Training Center (OTC).

registration.title: Create Account

registration.switchToLogin: Already have an account? Sign in
registration.success: Registration successful! An OTP has been sent to your email.
registration.formInvalid: Please check the form for errors
registration.info: Your organization will be automatically assigned based on your email domain. You will use OTP Verification for login.

registration.verificationError: OTP verification failed. Please try again.
registration.otpVerificationInfo: Please check your email and enter the OTP code to activate your account.
